title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile "To Lisa, Perry & Wytou, To All Things Blue""
medium: Blue, brown, orange crayon on white paper
inscribed: Inscribed in brown and blue crayon, lower left:  To Lisa/Perry & Wytou/To All Things/Blue
